{sequence

"""
They offered me some tea and sat me down very patiently and kindly, and explained that as far as Maria was concerned, this was A Thing. There was something about Maria that was looking for someone that would {wvy}save{wvy} her. Our friend was never entirely sure from what; Maria had never been forthcoming with details.
Maria would get into a relationship, enjoy the bright shiny new feeling, and then it would start getting into the point where you have to start actually making compromises, and then suddenly the perfect person she was dating isn't perfect any more. They're a regular human; by comparison, an unreasonable monster who doesn't care.
